description: I. Letter dated 17/02/2009 from Kitty Usher MP to the Deposited Papers Clerk, House of Commons Library, regarding the in-year Social Fund loans budget and the revised Jobcentre Plus budgetary area-level allocations. 2 p. II. Table showing revised Social Fund loans budgets for the year 2008/2009, broken down by Jobcentre Plus Budget Area. 2 p.
